short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyFlixTor - Watch & Download Movies From IMDb With MyFlixTor Movies App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyFlixTor is a FlixTor extension for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, & Opera browsers that when installed, injects streaming and download buttons into the movie pages of IMDB, the largest movie database in the world. Simply install the extension, navigate to IMDB.com, find your movie or tv show and look for the MyFlixTor buttons on the right, below the movie trailer. You will see a streaming button and a download button. Click the stream button and in one click you'll be taken to a streaming link to watch your movie or tv show. Click the download button and you'll be taken to a page that will display sites that allow you to download the movie. No annoying popup ads or hundreds of clicks. Easy as pie.
